result.arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
result.translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’izina ryanje, Jewe Imana Muremyi Yaremye ubuseruko n’uburengero vy'izuba, vy'ukwezi n'ivy'izindi nyenyeri[3], ko Twebwe Allah Dushoboye vyose!
result.footnotes: [3] Imana Allah Yarahiye kuri ivyo vyose, kuko harimwo ivyemezo vyerekana ubushobozi n'ububasha vy'uko Ishoboye kuzura ibiremwa.
